title: Marusska and Wolf Castle
creator_credit: Kratky Film, Phoenix Films, BFA Films and Video, Miroslav Kubricht, Vlasta Pospislova and Edgar Dutka
brief_description: Animated adaptation of the traditional Moravian tale of Marusska, a poor mountain girl, who dares to enter a haunted wolf castle and subsequently suffers the curse of the she-wolf.
creator_credit_for_label: Kratky Film, Phoenix Films, BFA Films and Video, Miroslav Kubricht, Vlasta Pospislova and Edgar Dutka
